info.name: Customizable Waveform Hue
info.description:
⧸ Style for https://soundcloud.com/ ⧸
↓Only one should be enabled. ↓↓Instead of leaving a DIY blank, write /**/ (Otherwise it won't install).
info.additionalInfo:
CHANGE LOG
04.29.2016 ~ Minor improvements and tweaks.

Inspired by user 297063's style 123512 I mostly did this to test out the style settings!!
    DISCLAIMER
    For fair warning, this style was created in google chrome, as it's my browser of choice. As for this styles compatibility with other browsers, that's not something I really have a way of testing. Also, my overall knowledge of coding is limited -- this is a hobby I've only just recently picked up -- so most of my styles are created by trial and error. So, I hope you can all be patient with me, I assure you, I am doing my best! Thank you for your time. = )

data.title: I'm new, how does this work?
awesome once you figure it out
